en.help_cmds: Shows a list of all commands.
en.help_cmd: Shows the help for a command.
en.help_cmd_param: Shows the help for a command and its parameters.
en.help_param: Shows the help for a parameter.
en.help_param_param: Shows the help for a parameter and its parameters.
en.help_subcmd: Shows the help for a subcommand.
en.help_subcmd_param: Shows the help for a subcommand and its parameters.
en.help_subcmd_param_param: Shows the help for a subcommand and its parameters and parameters.
en.help_topic: Shows the help for a topic.
en.help_topic_cmd: Shows the help for a topic and its commands.
